message.name: ERR_MAILING_ADDRESS_MANDATORY
message.locale: Please enter your mailing address

message.name: ERR_PHONE_AREA_CODE_MISSING
message.locale: If country selected then Area Code cannot be left blank.

message.name: ERR_PHONE_NUMBER_MISSING
message.locale: If country selected then Fax/Phone cannot be left blank.

message.name: ERR_PHONE_AREA_CODE
message.locale: All countries which have a Country Code of 1, Fax/Phone must be entered.

message.name: ERR_PHONE_AREA_CODE_3DIGIT
message.locale: First 3 digits of Fax/Phone must be numeric for all countries which have a Country Code of 1.

message.name: ERR_PHONE_NUMBER_7DIGIT
message.locale: Fax/Phone must be numeric and 7 digits for all countries which have a Country Code of 1.

message.name: ERR_PHONE_NUMBER_OTHER_COUNTRY
message.locale: Fax/Phone number must be numeric for all countries which do not have a country phone code of 1.

message.name: ERR_PHONE_INVALID_TYPE
message.locale: Personal mobile phone number or Business mobile phone number cannot have extensions.

message.name: ERR_PHONE_EXTENSION_NUMERIC
message.locale: Extensions can only be numeric.

message.name: ERR_ADDR_CA_CITY_MISSING
message.locale: City, Town, or Village must be entered.

message.name: ERR_ADDR_CA_PROV_MISSING
message.locale: Province or Territory must be selected for a Canadian address.

message.name: ERR_ADDR_CA_POSTALCODE_MISSING
message.locale: Postal Code must be entered.

message.name: ERR_ADDR_CA_INVALID_POSTAL
message.locale: Postal Code must be in the right format for a Canadian address.

message.name: ERR_ADDR_US_ZIPCODE_MISSING
message.locale: Zip Code must be entered.

message.name: ERR_ADDR_STATE_MISSING
message.locale: If country selected is other than Canada the State field cannot be left blank.

message.name: ERR_SEARCH_MANDATORY_MISSING
message.locale: Reference or partial name criteria are required.

message.name: ERR_PROVINCE_3CHARS
message.locale: Province, State or Territory requires at least 3 characters.

message.name: ERR_POSTALCODE_3CHARS
message.locale: Postal or Zip Code requires at least 3 characters.

message.name: ERR_PO_RESIDENTIAL
message.locale: P.O. Box/Rural Route/General Delivery shall not be entered for a residential address.

message.name: ERR_CITY_2CHARS
message.locale: City, Town or Village or Address Line 4 requires at least 2 characters.

message.name: WAR_ADDRESS_LOOK_UP
message.locale: Error Occurred During Address Look up, please Select 'Add New' proceed with adding address Manually.

message.name: ERR_INVALIE_EMAIL_ADDRESS
message.locale: Email address must be valid.

message.name: ERR_INVALID_PERSON_SEARCH_CRITERIA
message.locale: First Name and Last Name require at least 2 characters.

message.name: ERR_SEARCH_ADDITIONAL_MANDATORY_MISSING
message.locale: Search cannot be completed - Additional search criteria required.

message.name: ERR_PERSON_MERGE_TASK_EXISTS
message.locale: Merge cannot be performed due to Duplicate Person or Duplicate Person’s cases having open tasks.

message.name: ERR_PERSON_MERGE_TEMPORARY_SIN_FOR_BOTH
message.locale: Person merge is not allowed when both Master and Duplicate Person have temporary SIN.

message.name: ERR_PERSON_MERGE_MASTER_PERSON_TEMPORARY_SIN
message.locale: Person merge is not allowed when Master Person has temporary SIN and Duplicate Person has non-SIN Identifier or no SIN.

message.name: ERR_PERSON_MERGE_MARITAL_STATUS_OVERLAP
message.locale: A marital status with overlapping time period is not allowed.

message.name: WAR_DUPLICATE_PERSON_FEC_CASE
message.locale: This case belongs to a Duplicate Person. Do not perform any updates on this case. Find the Master Person and make updates to the Master Person’s FEC.

message.name: ERR_RESTRICTED_COUNTRY_SELECTED
message.locale: This participant is a prospect person and cannot be converted to a registered person as the Received from Country is restricted.

message.name: ERR_DIRECTION_INCOMING_SELECTED
message.locale: Direction must be outgoing for type “Interim Application-Outgoing”.
